name: Wilfredo León Venero

structured_info.background: Born July 31, 1993, in Santiago de Cuba, Wilfredo León Venero is a 201cm tall Cuban-Polish professional volleyball player. He is highly regarded as a unique talent and has achieved considerable success, earning a silver medal at the 2010 World Championship while representing Cuba. He holds a master's degree in administration and law, and is currently represented by Team GM.

summary: Wilfredo León Venero is a world-class volleyball player currently representing Poland, previously representing Cuba. He excels as an outside hitter and has a decorated career with multiple club and national team achievements, including World Championship and European Championship silver medals, and multiple Polish Championships. He currently plays for Bogdanka LUK Lublin.

name: Yoandy Leal

structured_info.background: Yoandy Leal earned a silver medal at the 2010 World Championship and is a notable player in Italian volleyball, often mentioned alongside Wilfredo León.

summary: Yoandy Leal is a Cuban volleyball player who has achieved international success, including a silver medal in the 2010 World Championship, and is currently a significant figure within the Italian volleyball scene.

name: Robertlandy Simon

structured_info.background: Robertlandy Simon won a silver medal at the 2010 World Championship alongside Wilfredo León and has become a prominent figure in Italian volleyball.

summary: Robertlandy Simon is a Cuban-born volleyball player who achieved international success, including a silver medal at the 2010 World Championship. He is now a notable athlete in the Italian volleyball league.

name: Małgorzata Gronkowska

structured_info.background: Małgorzata Gronkowska is a journalist who first interviewed volleyball player Wilfredo León Hechavarría in 2011 while working in Gdańsk. She was referred to as a young journalist in 2016.

summary: Małgorzata Gronkowska is a journalist known for her early interview with volleyball player Wilfredo León Hechavarría, and is his wife.

name: Alina León

structured_info.background: Alina León is the mother of volleyball player Wilfredo León and served as his initial coach. She is a former volleyball coach.

summary: Alina León is a former volleyball coach and the mother of professional volleyball player Wilfredo León, having also been his first coach.
